Home.title: Software Engineer & Developer
Home.subtitle: Premium quality application development services to help your business stand out.

skills.title: Backend Development
skills.description: I have experience with backend development using python, node.js and express. Databases used include MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and MySQL.

skills.title: Frontend Development
skills.description: I have experience with frontend development using React, Next.js for web development and React Native for mobile development.

skills.title: Infrastructure & Deployment
skills.description: I have experience with infrastructure using Cloudflare, Google Cloud Platform, and custom VPS configurations.

steps.title: Discovery Call
steps.subtitle: Do we match?
steps.description: Contact me to discuss your project, I will be happy to answer your questions. You can explain your project in detail and I will give you my feedback. I will also give you a quote for the project. I will also give you some advice on how to proceed.

steps.title: Concept & Strategy
steps.subtitle: Define the project
steps.description: I will provide you with a detailed plan for your project. Including the scope of work, the timeline, the budget, and the resources needed. I will also provide you with a quote for the project.

steps.title: Design
steps.subtitle: Some Magic
steps.description: As I'm not a designer, if you need a custom design, you will have to provide me with a design. Otherwise, I will provide you with a basic design that I think will fit your project.

steps.title: Development
steps.subtitle: More Magic
steps.description: will proceed to the development of your project. I will keep you updated on the progress of the project. I will provide you with a demo of the project at the end of the development process.

steps.title: Deployment
steps.subtitle: Ready to go
steps.description: Depending on your choice, the project will be deployed by me or the necessary resources will be provided to you that you can use to deploy the project yourself.

About.title: Nader Chatti
About.subtitle: I'm a software engineer and developer with a passion for building high-quality applications.
About.aboutTitle: Your Partner in Bringing Your Project to Life
About.aboutDescription1: Originally from Tunisia and living in France, I started with a Bachelor's degree in network and telecommunications before continuing my studies with a Master's degree in applied management information systems and finishing with a Master's degree in Mobility, Big Data, and Systems Integration.
About.aboutDescription2: I started working as a developer in 2017 and then as a Deep Learning solutions developer in 2019. After obtaining my master's degree, I specialized in Fullstack, web, and Mobile development solutions.
About.aboutDescription3: Today, I assist large companies as well as small clients, both professionals and individuals, in developing their solutions.

work.title: MyHotelMatch
work.description: Development of a matching platform for hotels and travelers.
work.challenge: Development of a matching platform for hotels and travelers.
work.goal: To create a platform that allows hotels to find the perfect match for their guests.
work.result: Apps are published and hotels have been onboarded.

work.title: Vast'Appli
work.description: Development of a web and mobile app allowing scheduling, appointment management, reports, and anomaly management
work.challenge: Replacing the old paper-based system with a digital one.
work.goal: To create a platform that allows users to schedule appointments, manage appointments, generate reports, and manage anomalies.
work.result: App is published and in use by the company.

work.title: Deep Bridge
work.description: Development of a deep learning model for the detection of brain tumors. In partnership with the university hospital center of Nice.
work.challenge: Permit doctors to detect brain tumors with a deep learning model.
work.goal: Develop a deep learning model that can detect brain tumors and a web app to visualize the results.
work.result: Solution delivered to the university and the university hospital center of Nice.

work.title: Smart Home
work.description: Development of a smart home platform allowing the control of home appliances through an app and a voice assistant.
work.challenge: Make a non-smart home smart using IPX800 hardware and an app.
work.goal: Develop a smart home platform that allows the control of home appliances through an app and a voice assistant.
